title: Queenstown
content:
Had another rest day on the Tuesday, which turned out to be a decent choice - many clouds were around, and some snow fell on the mountain, preparing for our final day out there.

We went up the gondola to luge again (this time with all 7 of us), but also one of the group had booked in a bungy! This was heaps of fun to watch, especially with the interesting low cloud hanging around.

Luge was hilariously good fun as well. With 7 people trying to overtake and race, chaos was pretty much the only way to describe it - one of us slipped and scraped an arm on the track, and another completely flipped their luge at the end! I think we were all exhausted just from the amount of laughing caused by the chaos!

Dinner was Hikari Japanese again (for 5 of us), and it was delicious again.
